sentence: This week, it's JR Majewski, an Ohio Republican candidate for Congress who attended the Jan. 6 Stop the Steal rally.
author: Carla Sinclair
title: Here's yet another gun-toting Republican in an anti-Democrat ad who "will do whatever it takes"

sentence: Watch below via PatriotTakes: Ohio Republican House candidate JR Majewski released an ad flashing images of AOC, Ilhan Omar, Colin Kaepernick, and President Biden and then showed himself walking with a loaded rifle while pledging to \u201cdo whatever it takes to return this country back to its former glory.\u201dpic.twitter.com/Wy4J8X90kP — PatriotTakes \ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8 (@PatriotTakes \ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8) 1645727368 PatriotTakes – an account that monitors right-wing hate speech on social media – condemned Majewski's "implied threats of violence."
author: Brandon Gage
title: GOP congressional candidate shows images of Democrats and wields rifle in ominous campaign ad
